topic.title: Find References and Declarations of Ant Components

body.p: The following search actions related to references and declarations of Ant components are available from the Search submenu of the contextual menu and from the Document References menu::

dlentry.dd: Searches all references of the item found at current cursor position in the defined scope.
Searches all references of the item found at current cursor position in the file or files that you specify after selecting a scope for the search operation.
Searches all declarations of the item found at current cursor position in the defined scope.
Searches all declarations of the item found at current cursor position in the file or files that you specify when defining a new scope.
Searches all occurrences of the item at the cursor position in the currently edited file.

body.p: The following action is available from the contextual menu and the Document Schema menu:

dlentry.dd: Moves the cursor to the location of the definition of the current item.You can also use the shortcut on a reference to display its definition.
